post.body: oh boy another study of a prostate eh?
the widescreen nuvi's are much better
most people have a hard time even seeing it
but do you also have an i3? We are a 3:2 household (GPS:person/cat). Perhaps we will make it an even 4:2 and reduce our fraction
we have a nuvi 660 and a c320, both have the same refresh rate. You're in for a huge upgrade, sure to be a total boi magnet
indeed, the sound of 10 fps map redraw sounds awesome. Wow what century do I live in?
you got one? Already?
aren't you a two-person office or some such? what will the lonely bartender serve, irradiated martini's that glow in the dark?
i'll take your word on the giving being better bit. gpsmagazine.com for reviews, the nu nuvi's are pretty damn sweet.
in honor of "Mad Men" i ordered an Old fashioned and it was delicious
it was pretty nice. my table came in second place at jeoparty and we all won $250. what to buy, what to buy...
the more I think about it the better of an idea it sounds. (Do i really need a new guitar though?) Why of course i do! : )
hopefully not too drunk to be unable to tweet pic the event. Twitterific stopped working but Twitterlator is going strong!
horray boxee!! Great success! My netflix streaming quality is teh suck tho, how's yours?
will the hot neighbor be watching you bend and flex and then eat some pie for lunch?
I want vodka and pie!
if you are in Texas than it was a breakfast taco, no matter the size
I hate you too!
ancient secrets based on american cheese eh? my how the times are a changing!
i likes a blend of extra sharp cheddar and jack. do you keep all those cheeses in your fridge on a regular basis? if so, damn!
cooks illustrated has the recipe for the best mac and cheese i've ever made. how did you incorporate the chiles in yours?
how's the hangover?
Keith Richards is ONLY 65 years old today WTH! Dude has to be pushing 85 at least.
Planning activities for our trip to the bay area: first order of business, a real goddamn burrito from La Victoria in San Jose mmm
Ow just got nudged! I'm balls deep in a clients VPN counting down the minutes left in this day. TONS of Fedex today btw
http://twitpic.com/t7r3 - @seismic007 behold the tinyness of the garmin i3. Scroll wheel input but all the same functionality of the c320
my 2.5 iphone is a lot less quick to hop on my wifi lately; it seems to stammer along on edge for many seconds before switching over, fucker
I put some phosphor-bronze strings on my Martin--they sound much nicer than the 80/20 elixir's i had on before.
A store I plan on spending ~$500 at in the near future is adding an extra $75 if you buy a $500 gift cert. Sounds like a good ROI, thoughts?
http://twitpic.com/xcgu - Behold: a breakfast burrito.
Chilling in the cultural mecca that is coarsegold, ca. @gmotors made an amazing pecan pie http://piurl.com/z1J : current location
http://twitpic.com/vzk9 - Attn texans: a proper burrito:
Going to trader joes FTW
Buying a super burrito with chile verde at la vics http://piurl.com/ybR : current location
In San jose!! http://piurl.com/yai : current location
http://twitpic.com/vvq4 - The happiest place on earth--waiting while people stow their carry-on luggage
We missed out flight but got rebooked on a non-stop that will get us there sooner.. And it only cost $100 extra, ftw?
packingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpackingpacking
Jeebers the UPS man sure had a helluva lot of small packages today, heh heh heh
starting to pack and prepare for the big trip to CA on wednesday. Please, for the love of fuck let there not be heavy fog at 6:35AM at KAUS
